item.title: United Airlines CEO gives 5-word prediction that low-cost rival will go out of business
item.description: United Airlines CEO Scott Kirby thinks Spirit's iconic yellow planes could soon be grounded for good, saying the airline will soon be out of business.

item.title: Mortgage rates tumble, marking largest weekly drop in a year
